name: pnp-spfx-reference-scenarios-spfx-obo
title: SPFx On-Behalf-Of flow
shortDescription: This is a sample solution that illustrates how to consume a backend API via OBO flow when invoking a middleware from SPFx solution.
longDescription: This is a sample solution that illustrates how to invoke a middleware Web API/service, from a SharePoint Framework solution, relying on the On-Behalf-Of (OBO) flow in order to consume a backend Web API/service.
